title: A list of all the things that make Lee absurd.
body:
His Q is an execute.
His W gives him a massive lifesteal and spellvamp steroid.
His E gives him true sight.
And his ult has a snare on cast.

and these are all things that are on top of the rest.

replies.body: It's not just his kit, it's the Lee mains that think they're soooo cool ward hopping or flash kicking. Lee sin may be balanced but he's just hands down one of the most annoying champions to play against for me.

finally someone that understands the situation

Lee Sin isn't OP, he's just annoying and far too popular for the people playing *against* him to enjoy it. I don't want to see the same champion every game, even if they aren't op

His E gives him true sight.


it hasn't been that way for awhile now
eh, it still giving sight is still just another thing that his powerbudget should be too low for but he has anyway.
